risks_and_outlook.key_risks: Macro-economic conditions, including inflation, rising interest rates and recessionary concerns
risks_and_outlook.guidance: Net sales of $10.95 billion to $11.05 billion, comparable sales of 4% to 5%, new stores of 25-30, and operating margin of 14.7% to 15.0%
risks_and_outlook.market_conditions: The beauty category is expected to continue evolving, with ongoing labor pressures, transportation and shipping cost pressures, and the COVID-19 pandemic having a negative impact on the business
